Putting your application in production

We currently do not offer a server-side implementation for Java.
We currently do not offer a server-side implementation for PHP.

Building your application

themes-gnap comes with tooling to build your application so that itâ€™s ready for production.

Execute the following command in a command prompt that is opened at the root of your application:

grunt build

After this task has completed you should see a new folder named dist.
